website_summaries.verdict: If you have small children and you are looking for a unified family look, these onesies won't work – but for older kids and adults, they have some features many consumers prefer.
pros: Features a no-foot design with hidden drop seat and hood
Snowflake design is practical for Christmas and the entire winter season
cons: Comes in small to extra-large sizes, but no sizes for small children
The fit is baggy, but some wearers think this adds to their comfort

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my big and tall son
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6'8" and 330 pounds. He loves onesie pajamas, but it is darn near impossible to find ones that will fit him. These are PERFECT and I will definitely be ordering more! He is autistic, and has sensory issues with clothing. He has had no issues with this onesie. In the several months since I bought it, he has worn it practically every night. It has held up fantastically to a few washings a week and is very well-constructed. He loves the monkeys because his favorite thing is animals. Thank you for selling such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenipher

customer_reviews.title: THIS ONESIE CHANGED MY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product six stars, I would. This has completely changed my life...for the better. I used to come home from work every day, sit on my couch, cold, and watch re-runs of Christly Knows Best until I would slowly drift to sleep. I would shove cheese balls into my mouth, one by one, until my hands became permanently stained by the orange cheese. But no longer will my life be that living hell hole, for now my onesie keeps me warm, and, like the arms of a loving companion I will never have, my onesie hugs me and tells me everything will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: I am Forever Lazy because of you.
customer_reviews.text: Forever Lazy, where have you been all my adult life?! You are so very soft and comfortable to be inside that I feel very safe & protected. Your many zippers allow me to easily use the bathroom & not drop you on the floor. You wash & dry without shrinkage, my cats love to sleep on you, and your oversize pockets allow me to carry phone and other items easily.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Cole

customer_reviews.title: 5'6" skinny male, ordered Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'6" somewhat skinny/fit male who ordered a Small. I read a few other reviews so I knew the legs would be a little long, but that's easily fixed by rolling up the legs. The arms are also a tiny bit too long, but not too long that I have to roll them up too. It's not too warm and the fabric is very soft. Definitely easier to wear than a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Maybe bad qc for sizing but comfy none the less
customer_reviews.text: Don't know where everyone its getting these "huge" onesies but mine doesn't fit anywhere near like their chart says. I'm 6'1" 280 and the xxl that's supposed to fit up to 6'7" 330lbs is almost too short. The rest fits decent but not as large as everyone says. I would say I may have gotten one that slipped through quality control but I ordered the xl first and it was too short and is supposed to be for 6'4". The xxl is just tall enough to be comfy but it's no where near "super baggy". By the way the xl did fit my size other than the height but again it's not baggy like they claim.
customer_reviews.author: foremanphill

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I love that there is a zipper for the back flap. There is a double zipper on the front. Nice warm pockets. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: angeka1120

customer_reviews.title: Great for wearing in cold downstairs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased X Large & Large for my husband & me. They both fit each of us well. Even though the Large is for me, I’m OK wearing the X Large. I’m 5’9”, 180 lbs & the Large is perfect; I think the next size down would be too snug. We have an old 2 story house with the downstairs always colder than upstairs. Our winters are mild for the most part so it’s not that big of a deal. These blanket suits are perfect for taking the chill off when downstairs. Great for MotorHome traveling to colder areas. I’ll probably Purchase 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a skinny build and i'm 5’9. I bought the small thinking it wouldn't be baggy, but it still was. The legs are not long enough by 3-4 inches and the arms are the same. The fabric is mildly comfortable. I have to note that the butt zipper on the inside and the main zipper in front is a tiny uncomfortable. Also, I was hoping the ends of the fabric for the arms and legs would be a bit tighter so I could role my sleeves up and keep it there, but it doesn't have that. And I look dumb in it because its baggy and not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I saw the add for this and chuckled. But then I got curious and decided to purchase one as a joke for my family. What I didn't expect was how much I would like this product! It's warm and comfortable and very utilitarian. I read the reviews before purchasing so I knew that they ran large. I'm 5'9" @200lbs so I ordered a Small. Fits perfectly! I had read about faulty zippers, I've had mine a few weeks and no issues, yet. I do feel the rear zipper is difficult to operate but, honestly, never going to use that one anyway. I liked it so much, i ordered another one the next week.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Onederfull

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong product but friend still delighted
customer_reviews.text: I love these onesies. My daughter and I have one and recently bought one for our new rommate so she could join the club during these weird covid shelter-in-place times. They sent the footed kind - the fit was slightly too large and shouldn't have been based on the sizes we have of the unfooted ones. Still, my friend is delighted and didn't want to return it - which is pretty impractical given the circumstances. Anyway, I wish they'd gotten the order right. Nonetheless, these onesies are the best things ever for sitting around the house or camping when that's a thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Gristled

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: A sleepless night led me to purchase this onesie, and I have no regrets. The tie dye sold me! I took the advice of other reviewers and ordered down 2 sizes. I’m about 5’7” and 215 lbs (XL-2XL tops, 16 jeans), and the medium fits PERFECTLY. I was excited that it was “footless,” but realized it actually does come with feet - but they’re removable! I’m stoked about the hood and pockets... and the butt flap is a great conversation piece! HAHA! If you’re looking for some fun loungewear, you won’t be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Turn down the heat, and save $.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now I can turn the heat down 5 degrees and still stay warm. Just wish I bought a small. I'm 5' 6" and a medium is huge. Mine was not supposed to have feet (I think) but it came with zip on feet, which now that I've tried it is a plus. Got the idea of buying this listening to a podcast interview with " The Mad Fientist", he said the adult onesie was the best thing he had bought on Amazon in the past year, and it saved him on heat. I don't know if it is the "best thing" but it is pretty good, and it can save on heat.
customer_reviews.author: Walter John Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: I loved the garment
customer_reviews.text: I loved the garment. It is a light weight but perfect polar fleece in a saturated black. Great details and zips etc. Here's where you have to decide what you want. I am 6'4" tall and 240 pounds. I got an XL as I would for any garment. This garment is humongous! Truthfully I wanted a little sex appeal, but I was SWIMMING in this size. It was formless. So I don't know what size to get now. I returned it. I don't know whether to get a large or a even a medium. Great garment for a great price for fun for adults! Just way oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Brion Vytlacil

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love them... so far. I bought 2 pair. Received them yesterday. I am 5 feet 10 inches tall, male, weigh 230 lbs, and have a 49 inch belly. I bought an XL, which fits perfect. The legs are a little long but I have no problem with that. They are very comfortable and warm. The front zipper can be opened and closed from the top and bottom at the same time or separately. When I washed and dried mine for the first time, I got a large sheet of lint from the dryer. Hopefully, I don't get that much lint every time or they will disappear in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Onesie made for partying
customer_reviews.text: Onesies are a vibe. I had a different one where I'd have to take it off to use the restroom - not so convenient for onesie bar crawls. This one has various zippers to help you go #1 and #2. It has good pockets. The feet zip off - they're pretty slippery on hard floors since there's no tread on the bottom. It's not plush soft, only slightly soft, but still comfortable. I got the large leopard print onesie - fits loosely, I'm 6'2" 190lbs. Anything smaller wouldn't fit my arms & legs.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McCourt

customer_reviews.title: Size XXS is more like an XL
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing chart and bought an XXS for a 5' tall adult weighing about 100lbs - this onesie is far from XXS - it's more like an XL. There is no way this thing was made for an "extra extra small" person - I'm 5'6 and 180lbs and I was able to put it on and zip it up! This was purchased for a family camping trip and out of 8 onesies we ordered from various sellers, this was the only one that did not even come close to fitting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Wore in 32 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because we were camping in freezing temperatures. I purchased a size small (5’4” 140 lbs) and it was definitely big, but I didn’t mind the extra space at all. I wore fleece leggings and a lightweight sweatshirt under it and stayed comfortably toasty, even when using the potty, thanks to the bum flap!!! The feet zip on and off. Will buy another and wear around the house ... may go extra small just to see if it’s too restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best Clothes to Be Lazy In!
customer_reviews.text: I have several footed onesies for lazy winter days, but this one is the best. The fabric isn’t the softest, but it’s not unpleasant and has softened with washing. The back flap is BRILLIANT - and the zippers work perfectly. It also has found the sweet spot for fabric warmth/thickness. It isn’t too hot, but not too thin either. These do run VERY large, so consider a size or even two down, especially if you’re a woman. Have to say, I love these. My new favorites for doing nothing at home.
customer_reviews.author: Juli I Z Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... email from Tyler at Forever lazy asking how i liked the product
customer_reviews.text: I got an email from Tyler at Forever lazy asking how i liked the product, I told him it was much larger than expected even after following their size chart. I asked for & got a code for 1/2 off another one as my daughter likes the larger one. I can't say enough good things about their customer service. Oh, and the product is super soft and cozy perfect for the upcoming fall and winter even if i am in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: mary watson

customer_reviews.title: Contact the seller if you have questions about the size. But all in all amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product 100%. It is a little bit long in the legs, I am 5 foot 5 and I weigh 230 lb and as far as the middle is concerned it fits very comfortably. The drop seat in the back is awesome in this cold weather. This is my second time buying these and I highly recommend them to anyone who's interested. I contacted the seller personally and asked what they would suggest would fit me they said I medium was best I still want with a large and it fits very comfortably just a little long in the legs I cuff them and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: A good onsie but be careful of rubbing...
customer_reviews.text: A onesie that has so much potential but is far behind the rest. Pro’s: love the flap in the back and the double zippers in the front so I can use the restroom without having to remove my onsie. Cons: inside the onsie the zipper is exposed so you need to wear underwear or you’re going to get some very uncomfortable rubbing in areas from the plastic zipper track, every other onsie I’ve ever had had a nice length of fabric on the inside covering the zipper track so you don’t get rubbed. I wore this for about two hours on a road trip and was very bothered by the zipper the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jams!
customer_reviews.text: Check the sizing- they say they run big & they DO! I bought two as gifts, both in Small. They fit both a lovely, round lil 4'11 size 12/14 grandma & a 5'9 150 lb super athletic Viking woman. I got one pair with feet & one without, both equally cool. They're roomy, the pockets & hood are huge & the two-way zippers are high quality & will probably out last the fabric even. I have made PJs as gifts for years, but I decided to try these out this year- so glad I did! Good price for a well designed, wonderfully oversize pair of jams.
customer_reviews.author: J Hay

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy but runs big
customer_reviews.text: My teenage boys are loving this in the cold weather to hang around the house in. Does run a bit large. My 16 yr old 5’10” 145 lbs fits a small. My 14 yr old 5’5” 100 lbs has an Xs which is a bit big but works. They especially like the zipper at the back
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third forever lazy I have purchased I love these products they are super comfortable and hold up very well! It’s great to lounge around the house in and you literally never have to take it off it’s wonderful! They are true to size and are roomy enough so that it’s still comfortable if you’ve never bought one do yourself the favor!!
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first, but then it shrunk.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and I for Christmas. I loved them at first, they were so comfy. Mine was really baggy, and I loved it. I had no problem fitting into it. But then I washed them and it shrunk significantly. I cannot fit comfortably in mine anymore. Not only is it too short, (the in the shoulders) but it went from baggy around the waist to too tight. And no... its not because I gained wait over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Y.

customer_reviews.title: I could live in these!  Amazon ~ they have fixed the husband having to think of what to buy; just check my list (:
customer_reviews.text: Luv them! Listen to the reviews. I am 5'9" and wear a size 12/super slim fit. I was going to order the 2x tie dye, I have so many problems with rompers, etc. I thought the bigger, the more height I would have. Luckily my husband ordered me the Large. I am swimming in them, and love it! The legs are super long, now I wish I had purchased the feetie. My son is 6'2" 265lbs. and he can fit into them, too. But, not as comfy as on me. They will be purchasing the feetie onesie's for me in a few weeks, for my Birthday. Love Amazon, mans answer to shopping! :)
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Big Fuzzy Hug
customer_reviews.text: What a delight to order a size down for a change. I live in Florida and feared I would sweat in this thing. I zipped the feet off and that seemed to give me the ventilation I needed during our holiday party. I wore a tank underneath so the top was a bit open as well. I'm 6 feet tall and this covered me like a fuzzy hug, even lying down, didn't ride up my backside, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Donna McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lounging around on cool Winter Days & Nights
customer_reviews.text: I love onsie PJs but I have to say that these are the absolute best that I have ever owned. I have been wearing mind non stop since I received them. I loved how the front zips up & down. The back also has 2 zippers which allow you to go to the bathroom without removing them. They are extra comfy and thoughtfully designed. I may have to buy another set so that I can launder these!!! I love love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Moe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but size chart is personal
customer_reviews.text: Size chart said small for my 5'8" 150 lb frame. It was HUGE and w/feet, easily zippered off (ad says non-footed) legs were well beyond length of my feet. Returned and reordered XXS. Perfect fit! Design is great. Zips down in front top, and up from bottom for easy nature calls as well as large back zip for same. Finally wore it as temps fell in SE VA. Warm & cozy. Large pockets for phone, TV remote, cigs, whatever. Love it. Just be careful about order if you prefer slimmer fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I actually haven’t been able to wear my new red one yet because it’s wrapped and under the tree. I’m very tempted to open it early because it’s so cold here. I have three more of the forever lazy suits and wear them every night! They are so warm and comfortable! The people who complain that they’re too loose just don’t get it. They are warm and yummy. I. Ant wait until Christmas to get my new one!
customer_reviews.author: jill hensley

customer_reviews.title: They are very BIG and very Long!! Ia XXX.
customer_reviews.text: The medium will fit a 6 foot tall man at up to about 300 pounds!!! I am 5 foot 5 and I weigh 160 pounds. I figured a medium would fit. But boy way I WRONG!! It ( the medium) is more like for a 6 foot 6 man that weighs at least 300 pounds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda tate

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and NO shrinkage
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is super roomy! I bought a Grinch onesie for my son (40 year old) and a grumpy cat onesie for my daughter in law and was surprised they loved them. I am going to buy them each one of these in red and one for the 4 children for Valentine’s Day! This onesie has drop seat two way zippers pockets zip off foots...love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter wear
customer_reviews.text: The temperature in the room I sleep in is whatever the temperature is outside. Starting this time of year, I have to pile on layers of blankets to keep warm throughout the night. With this onesie, I am having no problem staying warm, and I no longer need the pile of blankets. If you sleep on your back, the drop-seat zipper might be a little annoying. I just hike it up to the small of my back. I am 6’ 1” (73cm), and the Large fits great. I originally ordered the X-Large, but I was swimming in it. No problems with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Not sweatshirt material! Zip off feet!
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is not as pictured. I personally bought a onesie made out of sweatshirt material. I bought my husband one thinking the martial would be the same since the picture is the same. I ordered a non footed onesie and I got one made of fleece, with zip off feet. While I've very disappointed, my husband loved it so I won't be returning it but just a heads up if you bought a sweatshirt version this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: jaxx

customer_reviews.title: One of the best inventions ever!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old one to death and almost cried as I was forced to throw it away after almost 10 years. It was such a good friend while I had radiation treatments. I would come home from them feeling very cold and my Forever Lazy was so warm and comforting. This version is so softer, more comfortable and with no pilling that I had to order them for my family as well. We live in them!
customer_reviews.author: LadyFitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just be careful if you are taller than 6'4" with a long body esp. if you're fluffy.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute as a couples matching onesie. I found it difficult to decide because of the size charts. My husband is 6'4" but weighs around 330lbs. I am 5'9" and 175lbs. I ordered him the available 2X and the body was slightly short but we are thinking when he looses some weight it will be okay and his legs were plenty long. I got a M and it gave me plenty of room. These are very warm so we couldn't keep them on for long because of our Florida Christmas temp in the 70's.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lounging
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Medium and it fits great! 5'5" 180-190lb curvy woman. Could easily fit someone much larger. The legs are long and that's ok. Everything else fits great! Drop crotch so be forewarned, pockets are lower than expected. This is WARM! Super toasty and the drop seat is perfect for bathroom use. Double front zipper means I can wipe without having to reach around. Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: I have been wanting a onesie now for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a onesie now for a while and finally placed an order. I ordered the correct size based on the size chart provided. When the onesie arrived I instantly opened it up and put it on. Fitment was a bit tighter than I had hoped for, but decided to keep it rather than go through the hassle of returning it. Since the description says loose fitting I did not want to go up a size and be swimming in it. Overall I wish I had went with my gut and ordered one size up. Product otherwise seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son needed some pajamas to wear to a “Christmas pajama party” and we settled on the blue snowman. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality! They are super cute and fun but also very warm, almost blanket-like. Be sure to read the sizing chart because these are unisex and I would have ordered the wrong size had I not checked the height/weight sizing guidelines. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: boss

customer_reviews.title: Great, awesome, fun, but......
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, a devil dog, who just came home from being overseas for the last four years. He absolutely loves them and would live in them if he could. Great quality material, but I'm really tired of looking at his butt when he walks by. It comes with a zipper for the butt, and unfortunately the place where they sew it together came apart about two days into him wearing them, and the hole keeps getting bigger and bigger. So him being him, hasn't taken the time to sew them yet, so therefore I get a full moon, every time he walks by.
customer_reviews.author: Aryasfire

customer_reviews.title: THE Best and most comfy lounge-wear!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not get my fiance out of them!! Haha... seriously, he is in love! The zippers are all strategically placed so that you don’t have to undress at all throughout the day. The material is very soft, a nice quality thickness and the size was perfect. You want it to be loose for maximum comfort. We recommend buying these.. the most comfortable lounge-wear you will ever find on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MamaWalker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this onesie. It is so soft and I couldn't wait to give this to my boyfriend (who is always freezing) for Christmas. Out of all the gifts he got, he said this is his most favorite. We definitely got a good laugh out of it anyways. I seriously didn't think he was going to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really love this onesie! It's a little bit on the thick side, but it's so comfortable! I would be interested in one that's more of a jersey material too though, just because I can only really wear this when it's on the cooler side in my house. Love it for cold nights and lazy days!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Beeson

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I say it for as expected because I purposely ordered a size up, as I like my onesies big. I have a bit of an obsession, I have 13 onesies. This is my new favorite one! I didn’t notice the numerous zippers on the rear, on the ankles, and in the front for males until discovering them as I wore it. I think they are kind of strange, I wouldn’t prefer them, but I’m sure for many they serve their purpose well. I have already ordered two, one for me, and one for my boyfriend, and I plan to get a third soon. Super soft, perfect for the winter, and overall super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Person

customer_reviews.title: they're very comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for me and my boyfriend. They are HUGE. I bought a medium, I usually wear a medium/large, it was about 6" too long and I'm an average 5'5". Buy two sizes smaller than you typically would. A downside to these is they are incredibly prone to static. They may stick to you, and make sure you vacuum really well--even if you do you'll end up with a bunch of hair all over you, which is gross. Also, they're really hot, so don't get these unless your place is cold. Otherwise, they're very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Says no feet...has feet
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this item, but I would like it a lot more if it matched the description. It clearly says no feet, but the one I received has feet and the feet are very uncomfortable due to the thick seams in them. Unfortunately I did not realize this until I actually decided to use the item when it got cold. By that time the return period was over.
customer_reviews.author: Tman

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy, and fun... what else could you ask for??
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this. I bought it as a gift for my husband and he wears it all the time around the house. I also bought the tie dye one for him previously and it has held up great. They are funny, warm, and comfortable. They wash well and haven’t faded much. I will buy him others of this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker Bell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with my new Onesie!
customer_reviews.text: I got my onesie yesterday and it is way better than I expected! It does run a bit large but I like it baggie. It's sooooo soft and feels my favorite throw blanket that I can wear. Seems to be very well made with a zipper in the back and one in the front. The zippers are double pull so you can customize it to your liking. I ordered the non-footed and now I see they have a footed one. Think I will stick to my non-footed but definitely gonna order more. It's so much nicer than the ones I saw in the stores. I gotta say I am very very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a zipper removable foot purple one and loved it so much came back for more. Except bonus. I ordered non footed (the zipper foot version was "out" in my size/color) and got one with zipper feet sent to me. Happy mistake for me! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Garton - Salem/Eugene

customer_reviews.title: I received with in 1-2 days and with the cold weather coming up I'm extremely happy I ordered it I'm looking to order another
customer_reviews.text: Luv my Onsie, I'm 5'1"; size 12-14 and ordered a Medium. It fits perfectly with just enough room for baggie comfort. I received with in 1-2 days and with the cold weather coming up I'm extremely happy I ordered it I'm looking to order another.
customer_reviews.author: sldeal

customer_reviews.title: Super snuggly and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super snuggly and soft! Super cute. I am a big girl. 6 ft and about 250, and it fits fine with room to spare. I got the skull n cross bones one. Nice design. Best one out there so far. Trap back door is essential i think, yet most adult onsies dont bother to put one in.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly large, now we match!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. The feet seem small for the size body that fits. I ordered a medium for myself (5’5 dress size 12) and it was huge! It comfortably fits my husband (5’10 250) so I’ll be ordering a small for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: so so so comfy. . great quality
customer_reviews.text: this company never disappoints me.. the quality is always great! I purchased one of their onsies a few years ago and sadly had to leave it in the care of a friend when I moved.. justgot this one and I'm so comfy so cozy sitting on the couch with my husband.. who I bought one for also.. he also LOVES it :)))
customer_reviews.author: twzdfirestrtr

customer_reviews.title: He Loves His Onesie!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this! He usually wears a size XXL tee shirt and size L shorts. He is about 5'11 and 185 lbs. Although he is not large at all he loves his clothes very loose. In reality he measures an XL top and M bottom. The large Onesie fits perfect-is nice, soft, very loose and comfy. But not overly large-just right. He lives in it in the winter. Wears it all day and to bed. Hubby thanks you for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: ricochet

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size chart
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to size chart! Very comfy but VERY big, I’m 5’8 and ordered an XL, the crotch hangs just above my knees. I have to pick it up when I walk. My favorite part is the flap in the back, no need to take the whole thing off to use the bathroom. Material is a soft fleece
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Unique design features
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the feeling in the texture of the pajama itself however it had a lot of creative qualities to it. The texture of fabrics is something extremely personal however so I would not consider someone's opinion for yourself you may not be bothered by the fabric. If my husband would have ended up wearing them I would have kept them. They were the only pajamas that are onesie style that had a full zipper in the back which was not only functional but hilarious for an adult. I can't remember if they had pockets, you have to read the description to discern that.
customer_reviews.author: SIC

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to heating the rooms this winter
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 14-year-old son who is always a bit cold. He loves it and has taken to it with zest. We home school and he has almost made it our official uniform. The room that we use for school is always kept around 20 dgrees C (to save money and all), so this has proved to be a much cheaper option to keeping him warm. Now his mother and littlest brother want ones of their own. The details, featurers and quality of build are all excellent and seem much better than those offerred by others.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Fits kinda weird, but super cozy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure exactly who this is supposed to fit, but it definitely isn't my body type. I'm 5'2", 180lbs, and ordered a small and a medium. The main difference was the length, but everything else seemed pretty similar. I sent the medium back and kept the small. The crotch on the small is still down by my knees when I wear it, and I'm pretty sure the feet were designed for someone who wears a size 14 shoe, so I zip those off. With all that being said, it worked for my Halloween costume, and now I can lounge around the house in it. It's super warm and cozy, but it's gonna fit weird if you're under like 5'6".
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: I debated about buying this because of the size...I normally wear a 3XL and this only goes up to a 2XL. After reading all the reviews stating that it runs large I decided to place my order. I love these pajamas! First thing I took off the “feet,” and then tried them on and “thank you” to all the great reviews, they fit with some room to spare. Love the zippered flap in the back, which I haven’t made use of as yet. Am planning on purchasing another, and would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for some cozy loungewear. Just remember to order a size smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Studley

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: So I never write reviews, for good or bad...however, I will for these. These onesies are great!!! My boyfriend has been hinting he wanted one, so I set out to read reviews and start my hunt. He is 5'9, about 155lbs, good trim not skinny build and I got him a medium. Little baggy on his chicken legs but fits hims comfortably. Baggy but in a comfy roomy way...he's obsessed with it. I'm a big girl, 5'8 and thick, got a 3x and it's baggy on me, not overly baggy, but perfect. If I ever get pregnant there's plenty of belly fabric room and stretch for growth lol. They are super warm and snuggly and we're very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the xxs for my Where The Wild Things Are Halloween costume. I expected it to be big on me (I’m about 4’11 and 110 lbs), but it was way bigger than I expected! Thankfully I didn’t mind it being oversized, and It ended up being perfect for my costume after I rolled up the legs a few times. The material is soft and high quality. I’m definitely looking forward to wearing it around the house this winter. Just remember to wash it inside out before you wear it the first time. The fleece material leaves behind lint if you don’t!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but huge.
customer_reviews.text: These things are big. In normal clothes, I wear an XL, sometimes 2XL. After reading reviews saying they run too big, I ordered a large. It's a pretty good fit. I'm 5'9" and 230lbs. It's comfortably loose, but mostly baggy because I'm not tall enough to fill it. I love the double zipper in the front for easy peeing. The butt flap opens really wide, which is good. It's warm and soft, like wearing a blanket. My toddler loves cuddling when I wear it. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium. It fits but I wish I had got the next size up because I was on the high side of the weight and height on the chart.. so it fits really snug. I'd prefer a little extra room. It's great quality btw
customer_reviews.author: CashCarver

customer_reviews.title: This is literally the best onesie I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best onesie I have ever worn, and I have ordered several from various other Amazon stores over the years. The fabric is very soft, like a plush fleece fabric, that's soft both on the outside and on the inside. It has a very sizeable hood so my hat-hating head fits inside with room to spare, but it doesn't fall down over my face. It has pockets (always a plus), and zipper-butt (which I didn't even realize until it arrived)!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Daddy skin to skin bonding with Newborn baby
customer_reviews.text: I originally got one in a Christmas white elephant gift exchange and never used it. I recently has a baby and really wanted to do skin to skin bonding with her but I'm a husky guy and am embarrassed to be shirtless around people. The forever lazy was the perfect solution. I can zip down and put my baby on my chest with the comfort of having the rest of me covered up and not be embarrassed when people walk in the room not knowing I'm shirtless.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Fit per sizing guide
customer_reviews.text: We ordered both black and purple onsies. Black fit per sizing guide--and had removable feet, an added bonus. The purple was a bit small in the tummy, with no feet (as described). Both arrived appropriately packaged and on time. These appear to be made of typical sweatshirt type fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Finally no more wedgie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I recently purchased a different brand and it rode up and was major wedgie city. HOWEVER, not the problem with this onesie. It is baggy and long enough through the torso. I bought this a onesie pub crawl, but I'm totally in love with how comfy it is I think I'll be wearing all winter. It is baggy so dont expect to look sexy. I'm 5'10" 230 and ordered a L.
customer_reviews.author: L. Charleson

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large, but well made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cute onsie as a gag gift for my 55 year old brother. He is ~5'10, 180lbs and the size large was huge. A medium would have been a better fit, these run extra large. The material is substantial, and it has zipper front and flap on the bum. Great for reading the news paper on cold morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kityk4t

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but, the material is thinner than I would have expected. I have purchased a jumper from wall-mart that was much thicker and much warmer and only cost me $20 not $40. It feels like a basic fleece that is only 1/8 of an inch thick. I also wish it was better made for the price. I'm just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: ORDER A SMALLER SIZE (OR 2)
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable as this onesie is, it is extremely mis-sized, I am 5’10 180lbs and wear a medium in almost all my clothing,I ordered a M in this onesie and was very surprised at how EXTREMELY LARGE It fit everywhere except the arm length being just the right length.. my brother is 6’4 250lbs and It fit him good everywhere except (you can guess) yup the arms length being too short.. It was very upsetting as It was a Christmas onesie party and I was the only shmuck wearing a onesie twice my size
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jones

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 5'9" partner and he burst out of the bathroom dancing. He loves it. It's a little big on him because he likes his clothes baggy (we got a large), but he slept like an actual baby
customer_reviews.author: poetic_moni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Onsies are popular in my house right now, my husband loves his! We live in Florida so the need for heavy sweaters does not really happen, but on the days where it is nippy these are awesome and it even has a butt flap with a zipper that i thought was really neat. It is made well and has a built-in hoodie. My husband is built on the larger side and the XL fit him great with room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly. The product is oversized so it is pretty loose but fits nice for lounging. The first one we ordered was HUGE and had to be sent back for a smaller size but the customer service was great! We got a very fast refund and the new one we ordered was sent out quickly. We are happy with our purchase. The quality seems good but will reveal itself in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Very cozy. Length is accurate with size chart. Lots of room around the middle. Bought 5 for our family for Halloween. Had my 13 year old daughter try it on and she won’t take it off. 3 female, 2 male family members. Choose size based on chart. Bought XL for 6’2 husband, L for 6’ son, XS for me 5’6, and XXS for 5’4 daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Biff Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good pajamas, good price
customer_reviews.text: The small is a perfect fit for me I am 5'5 and about 150 pounds. I didn't know that it came with zippers to take off the feet, which is a big plus. I will say though. If I was an inch or 2 taller I'd need the next bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best onesies I ever had. They run supper large though. Im 5'4 130 lbs and the XXS fit perfectly. Nice, warm and thick material. I love the fact that it zips in the front as well as the butt cheek. And the extra deep pockets are a bonus. I plan on ordering 2 more. Whenever I wear them, I lower my heat which I'm return same on my gas bill. These onesies are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and I LOVE them! Good quality, for sure. They’re seriously warm though ha! He has a hard time wearing them because of that and the usually warm weather right now.
customer_reviews.author: crys

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews before purchasing! Size down!
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the reviews I have read, the onsies do run very large. I read the reviews before purchasing and decided to get an xsmall. I’m glad I did. Normally I would have gotten a medium or large. This fit almost perfectly. It was still a little loose and a tad bit long but threw it in the wash and dried it to see if it would shrink up a little and it did. Now I’m happy with it. My husband is 5’11” and weighs 192 and I bought him a medium! It fit him perfectly. I’m happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I would have never thought as a 37 year old woman that I would love to get up in the morning and I work from home and put on this onesie is the most comfortable thing I put on in a while it was so comfy I bought three more one for my husband and one for both of my teenage Sons and they all wear them lol
customer_reviews.author: Jen Collins

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I wear an XL but ordered medium and its a tad big even after washing and drying. Order two sizes down. It is warm and decently soft but not scratchy like others say. Seat drop is a PLUS. Very boxy looking and hangs really low by crotch area. Pockets passed my knee caps lol but its not a deal breaker. A bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Runs Large!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the largest size with footies for my big guy and they fit! I ended up buying a back up pair for him since he loves them so much. I then bought the footless ones for myself. I'm 5'2" and am on the round side myself. XS fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfy a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who is 6'4" and it fit perfectly!!! He live in Minnesota so this keeps him warm when he is lounging around the house, the pattern is cute and it is so soft. IHe wears this all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: TempeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than I expected, since I ordered it for a Halloween costume. Quality fleece, solid zippers, and roomy enough to wear over clothes or pajamas. Runs slightly big. The small is very roomy on my daughter who is 5' 8" and 140 lbs, but it is not unreasonably large or too long and may even shrink up a bit after washing. She hasn't taken it off since it came, even though Halloween is weeks away and now everyone in the house wants their own to lounge in!
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Exceeded all my expectations💜
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I knew it would be cute and I knew it would fit him - but what I didn’t expect was how ridiculously well made and plush it is! The zippers are beautifully sewn, the cut is generous and well thought out, and it’s stinking adorable. Couldn’t (and didn’t) wait till Xmas to give it to him because I HAD to see him in it.
customer_reviews.author: Theoni Gray

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing more patriotic than this onsie.
customer_reviews.text: Of the several onsies I now own, this is the best overall; their size chart is accurate, zipper flap is way easier than velcro, and it's super cozy. I would get another. (I'm 5'8 women's size 8-10 and got a Small, works great!)
customer_reviews.author: harriet27awesome

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 13 year old to use for Halloween. He loves it and hasn't taken it off. Will be his go-to lounge around the house wear for the winter. Quality is much better than expected. Does run big. He is 5'7 130 lbs and ordered the small.
customer_reviews.author: LBM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is comfy that I order 4 more after receiving the first one. Now my whole family and I will match on Christmas morning! They are long, but I don't have an issue with that at all. I just roll it up when I'm walking and pull it over my feet when I'm lounging.
customer_reviews.author: Ahloris

customer_reviews.title: Bought for everybody
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and after seeing that it was a great as expected, I bought them for the rest of the family. The back door and front zipper that allows everyone potty access without completely undressing are THE BEST! AND POCKETS!! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Baneeners

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 5 of these in various sizes and patterns for Christmas Eve gifts. Everyone loves theirs. I ordered smaller sizes according to the size chart and they all fit great and are so comfy. They have been through the washer and dryer and are even more soft. I recommend this brand of onsies!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Fit is fine but Quality is well.....
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect actually! I'm 6' 4" and weigh sadly 325. This fits very well. Should make the random day at work go over " confusing, lol". But the build quality is subpair. Even before taking it out of the packaging, you could see the stitching being so so. I get the price point, but does it hurt to take an extra second and end the stitch marks?
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!
customer_reviews.text: This Onsie is soft, well made and COMFY!!!! It runs very large so I would downsize. My son and daughter in law were so jealous when they saw mine at Christmas. I'll be ordering them some when the print I want comes back in stock from being sold out.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: XS was roomy on me, an adult woman! Super cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This is SOOOO cozy and comfortable! I'm 5'6" and a size 6 and the XS is perfect--legs and arms are the right length for me; very roomy around the body. The butt zipper is cluuuutch for burning man porto potties ;) Kept me warm during those cold desert nights. Highly recommend! Got tons of compliments on the style and coziness. For people smaller than me, maybe a kids size?
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I havent been able to find anything like these that fit me. Untill now! Im 5'10"ish and usually wear a 3xl shirt. I got the 2xl and the legs are long enough and they are very roomy. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband so we could wear our onesies together. He loves the dang thing lmbo! The only thing I was very disappointed in(especially for how much I paid) was the fabric. It’s not a plush soft comfy fleece. It’s more like the crappy $5 Walmart blanket fleece. But whatever I guess it’s manlier.
customer_reviews.author: BayouDoll

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 17 year old son. He loves wearing onesies around the house! 🤣 It is soft and warm. He is 5’7 and 120lbs and the M is a bit too big, but workable especially as it gets cooler out.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy - and WARM!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Forever Lazy onesie purchase. I bought one last year for pajama day at my school...my first graders enjoyed seeing me in my pjs...if you are considering them for any function where you'll be wearing them all day, however, I must warn you - they are SUPER WARM...borderline "too warm." Choose a SUPER COLD day to wear them...or plan on sweating lol...great PJs tho...no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adaya B.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly perfect!
customer_reviews.text: All other reviews are right- exceeded my expectations with all the design elements- zipper locations, deep pockets. I’m wearing it way more often than I thought I would!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a Pajama party. The dye tie went over fantastic! As for the actual product, it has pockets that are great. The zip off booties look great and would be great, but I didn't use them since I was in public. It was not scratchy at all inside. It does cost more than some others, but the quality is there. don't hesitate on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is dull. I purchased this same item for a male friend and the color is much more richer than the one I received today. THE FEET ZIP ON BACKWARDS !!!. Too large. When trying to return for exchange the correct return label wasn't sent which Im now stuck with an item I can't use. Im NOT at all happy about this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Onsie review
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 16yo son who loves it!! It's a little on the loose side which makes it comfortable and not restrictive and tight. I would purchase this product and highly recommend it to anybody looking for a well made adult/child onesie.
customer_reviews.author: Florida671

product_meta.title: Forever Lazy Non-Footed Adult Onesies, One-Piece Pajama Jumpsuits for Men and Women, Unisex. with Detachable Feet.
feature_bullets: RELAXED, UNISEX SIZING - Our sizing does not follow any traditional sizing because the onesies are unisex. As a result, it is extremely important that you follow our Forever Lazy size chart in the secondary images. Start with the height column on the size chart, then slide over and make sure your weight is within the size for your height. If not, size up until your weight is found.

SOFT, COMFORTABLE MATERIAL - Our Forever Lazy onesies are made with a high quality, 100% polyester fleece that is ultra soft and anti-pill. Our onesies can be conveniently laundered at home with a washing machine. Simply add the onesie to a load with like colors, wash in cold water, and then tumble dry on a low heat setting or hang dry.

ZIPPER DETACHABLE FEET AND REAR ZIPPER DROP SEAT - Our onesies feature a hidden zipper tract that allow users to remove or re-attach the feet as desired thus offering the versatility of both a footed and non-footed pajama. This also comes equipped with a concealed, rear zipper drop seat is conveniently located on the back side of the onesie, so you never have to take it off, even to use the restroom.

DEEP SIDE POCKETS & HOOD - Our onesies feature extra deep side pockets that will fit just about anything you would ever need to carry around with you, including a remote, your cell phone, a water bottle, or even a snack! The hood is equipped with drawstrings and will keep your head warm on the chilliest of nights.

GIVE THE GIFT OF LAZINESS - A comfortable pair of one-piece pajamas is a thoughtful way of telling him or her, "You deserve to relax, and do nothing for a long time" - making for very fun and unique present.
